name: Pesto-Crusted Grouper
author: thedailygourmet
summary: These grouper fillets are quick to make, and take minimal ingredients. Enough to serve 2 people unless you're super hungry.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ tablespoon Greek seasoning (such as Cavender's®)
directions: Season grouper fillet with salt and pepper
Mix bread crumbs and Greek seasoning in a small bowl
Rub pesto over the grouper and top with bread crumbs
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Place fillet in the skillet and cook for 3 to 4 minutes
Carefully turn over and cook until fillet is cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes
Turn over once more, being careful to leave the panko breading in place
Split fillet in half for 2 servings
